about_the_game:
Become a beginner adventurer in this co-op RPG. Select and complete one of the many quests to earn promotions. Choose your playstyle to defeat enemies and help those in need. Enjoy quick gameplay sessions, either solo or with friends.

PLAY FAST GAMES

Even if you don't have time to play all day, this game allows you to play quick sessions to relax.

Choose quests given in the tavern. Completing each quest will increase your rank.

To complete a quest, you can focus on whatever interests you.

GATHER AND CRAFT

If you prefer to relax and gather resources for quests, you can do that.

Every map offers unique resources and crafting options, so you won't get bored.

FIGHT

If you enjoy combat, you can choose your weapon.

  • Sword: Available as a one-handed or greatsword. If you choose a one-handed sword, you can use a secondary weapon.

  • Bow: A ranged weapon that requires arrows, which can be expensive.

  • Magic Staff: Allows you to wield magic. By connecting it to a nature orb, you can use magic of that type.

EXPLORE

If you're not interested in crafting or combat, you can explore the many islands of this world, each offering unique experiences and histories. You'll find many interesting places throughout the islands, where you can discover loot to help prepare for quests.
